title: Word2Vec Model Training (deprecated)
description: Trains a shallow neural model, and projects each document onto this vector embedding space. Deprecated as of Fusion 5.2.0 and will be removed in a future release.

id.title: Spark Job ID
id.description: The ID for this Spark job. Used in the API to reference this job. Allowed characters: a-z, A-Z, dash (-) and underscore (_). Maximum length: 63 characters.

trainingCollection.title: Training Collection
trainingCollection.description: Solr Collection containing labeled training data

fieldToVectorize.title: Field to Vectorize
fieldToVectorize.description: Solr field containing text training data. Data from multiple fields with different weights can be combined by specifying them as field1:weight1,field2:weight2 etc.

dataFormat.title: Data format
dataFormat.description: Spark-compatible format that contains training data (like 'solr', 'parquet', 'orc' etc)

trainingDataFrameConfigOptions.title: Dataframe Config Options
trainingDataFrameConfigOptions.description: Additional spark dataframe loading configuration options

trainingDataFilterQuery.title: Training data filter query
trainingDataFilterQuery.description: Solr query to use when loading training data if using Solr

sparkSQL.title: Spark SQL filter query
sparkSQL.description: Use this field to create a Spark SQL query for filtering your input data. The input data will be registered as spark_input

trainingDataSamplingFraction.title: Training data sampling fraction
trainingDataSamplingFraction.description: Fraction of the training data to use

randomSeed.title: Random seed
randomSeed.description: For any deterministic pseudorandom number generation

outputCollection.title: Output Collection
outputCollection.description: Solr Collection to store model-labeled data to

sourceFields.title: Fields to Load
sourceFields.description: Solr fields to load (comma-delimited). Leave empty to allow the job to select the required fields to load at runtime.

partitionCols.title: Partition fields
partitionCols.description: If writing to non-Solr sources, this field will accept a comma-delimited list of column names for partitioning the dataframe before writing to the external output

writeOptions.title: Write Options
writeOptions.description: Options used when writing output to Solr or other sources

readOptions.title: Read Options
readOptions.description: Options used when reading input from Solr or other sources.

modelId.title: Model ID
modelId.description: Identifier for the model to be trained; uses the supplied Spark Job ID if not provided.

withIdf.title: IDF Weighting
withIdf.description: Weight vector components based on inverse document frequency

w2vWindowSize.title: Window Size
w2vWindowSize.description: The window size (context words from [-window, window]) for word2vec

w2vMaxSentenceLength.title: Max Sentence Length
w2vMaxSentenceLength.description: Sets the maximum length (in words) of each sentence in the input data. Any sentence longer than this threshold will be divided into chunks of up to `maxSentenceLength` size.

w2vMaxIter.title: Max Iterations
w2vMaxIter.description: Maximum number of iterations of the word2vec training

w2vStepSize.title: Step Size
w2vStepSize.description: Training parameter for word2vec convergence (change at your own peril)

minDF.title: Minimum Term Document Frequency
minDF.description: To be kept, terms must occur in at least this number of documents (if > 1.0), or at least this fraction of documents (if <= 1.0)

maxDF.title: Max Term Document Frequency
maxDF.description: To be kept, terms must occur in no more than this number of documents (if > 1.0), or no more than this fraction of documents (if <= 1.0)

norm.title: Vector normalization
norm.description: p-norm to normalize vectors with (choose -1 to turn normalization off)

predictedLabelField.title: Word2Vec Feature Field
predictedLabelField.description: Solr field which will contain vector features when the word2vec model is applied to documents

serializeAsMleap.title: Serialize as Mleap Bundle
serializeAsMleap.description: Serialize the output model as Mleap Bundle

minSparkPartitions.title: Minimum Number of Spark Partitions
minSparkPartitions.description: Minimum number of Spark partitions for training job.

stopwordsList.title: List of stopwords
stopwordsList.description: Stopwords defined in Lucene analyzer config

overwriteExistingModel.title: Overwrite existing model
overwriteExistingModel.description: If a model exists in the model store, overwrite when this job runs

outputField.title: Output Field
outputField.description: Solr field which will contain terms which the word2vec model considers are related to the input

uidField.title: ID Field Name
uidField.description: Field containing the unique ID for each document

numRelatedTerms.title: Number of Related Words
numRelatedTerms.description: For each collection of input words, find this many word2vec-related words
